name: Flying a Helicopter
problem:
<u>GOAL</u>: Fly the helicopter over barriers to th
destination (blue flag).
<indent=5%>
+ Start the <color=#f5f5f5>ENGINE</color>,
+ <color=#f5f5f5>CONTINUE</color> <color=#f5f5f5>CLIMBING</color> up
+ <color=#f5f5f5>MOVING</color> forward to the right position an
<color=#f5f5f5>HOVER</color>
+ <color=#f5f5f5>CLIMB</color> down to capture the flag.
